dadabit.ultrasonic_init|block: 初始化超声波传感器接口 %port
dadabit.temphumidity_init|block: 初始化温湿度传感器接口 %port
dadabit.setLego270Servo|block: 设置乐高270°舵机|编号 %index|角度 %angle|运行时间 %duration
dadabit.setLego360Servo|block: 设置乐高360°舵机|编号 %index|方向 %oriention|速度 %speed
dadabit.soilMoisture_init|block: 初始化土壤湿度传感器接口IIC ADC模块 %port
dadabit.brightness_init|block: 初始化光敏传感器接口IIC ADC模块 %port
dadabit.rainwater_init|block: 初始化雨滴传感器接口IIC ADC模块 %port
dadabit.setWifiAPmodule|block: 设置WIFI模块AP热点模式, WIFI名: %ssid 密码: %password
dadabit.setWifiConnectToRouter|block: 设置WIFI模块连接到路由器，WIFI名称 %ssid 密码 %password
dadabit.connectThingSpeak|block: 上传数据到ThingSpeak Write key = %write_api_key|Field 1 = %n1||Field 2 = %n2|Field 3 = %n3|Field 4 = %n4|Field 5 = %n5|Field 6 = %n6|Field 7 = %n7 Field 8 = %n8
dadabit.getDatafromThingspeak|block: 从ThingSpeak获取 field Id %fieldId 数据， channel id %channelId 和 read key %readKey
dadabit.setServo|block: 设置舵机|编号 %index|角度 %angle|运行时间 %duration
dadabit.setBusServo|block: 设置总线舵机|编号 %index|角度 %angle|运行时间 %duration
dadabit.setMotorSpeed|block: 设置电机1速度|%speed1|和电机2|速度 %speed2
dadabit.line_followers|block: 四路巡线模块|%lineFollowerSensor 检测到|%lineColor ?
dadabit.Ultrasonic|block: 超声波传感器检测到障碍物距离(厘米)
dadabit.getSoilMoisture|block: 获取土壤湿度传感器值
dadabit.sendSensorData|block: 将传感器数据发送给WIFI模块
dadabit.sendData2Wifi|block: 将数据 %data 发送给WIFI模块
dadabit.getUltrasonicDistance|block: 获取超声波传感器检测到障碍物距离(cm)
